app.name: Instant Username Search
app.description.title: Check username availability as you type

whyUs.header.sub: Expand your brand across the web
whyUs.row.benefit.header: A new idea? We got your back!
whyUs.row.benefit.details: You can easily test & find the best suitable username for your next endevour
whyUs.row.platforms.header: One click to see them all
whyUs.row.platforms.details: You can easily search on 100+ platforms for your username. Also, you can use advanced search to narrow down your results
whyUs.row.instant.details: So, you found your new username and would love to register them. If you like, we can automate it for you! (Coming soon)
